text: Zodiac Killer Records is an independent record label, formed in 1991 by Ron Zodiac.Ginger Coyote, "Ron The Man Behind Zodiac Killer Records" https://www.punkglobe.com/ronthemanzodiackiller609.html ==History== ===Formation=== Zodiac Killer Records was first founded in Harrisburg, Pennsylvania in the spring of 1991 as a device to put out the first album by the band Sugarhed, a hardcore punk band."Sugarhed," www.discogs.com Following the release of the 2 song 7-inch Extended Play the label would remain dormant until its next release in 1997, with a release by punk rock band Stiletto Boys "Stiletto Boys," www.discogs.com of Lancaster, Pennsylvania, followed by another Stiletto Boys 7-inch release in 2008."Attitude Adjuster," www.discogs.com In 2007 Ron relocated the label to Cheyenne, Wyoming."Ron The Man Behind Zodiac Killer Records" https://www.punkglobe.com/ronthemanzodiackiller609.html Zodiac Killer Records ramped up its release schedule with over ten releases that year,\- Discography, https://www.punkglobe.com/ronthemanzodiackiller609.html including a release by Italian punk rockers Idol Lips."Album of the Week: IDOL LIPS – “Street Values”" http://www.50thirdand3rd.com/album-of-the-week-idol-lips- street-values/" IDOL LIPS – “Discografia”" https://it.wikipedia.org/wiki/Idol_Lips The label saw four years of rapid-fire releases, putting out over 50 releases in just two years., including releases by punk bands Dwarves,"Dwarves - Fake ID, Bitch" http://www.thedwarves.com/?q=node/262 Electric Frankenstein, Antiseen,"29th St. Disciples signs with Zodiac Killer" https://www.westword.com/music/29th- st-disciples-signs-with-zodiac-killer-5690073 Supersuckers, GG Allin,"GG Allin and the Carolina Shitkcikers" https://www.allmusic.com/artist/zodiac-killer- records-mn0001037555 Royce Cracker,"Dwarves/Royce Cracker" http://www.thedwarves.com/?q=node/285 Brainerd,"Brainerd" http://www.thedwarves.com/?q=node/285 and others. Zodiac Killer Records continued to produce a great number of its releases on the 7-inch, 10-inch, and 12-inch vinyl format. ===Bands=== Zodiac Killer Records has released records and songs for other such punk bands and artists as Nick Oliveri, Copstabber, Buzzcrusher, The Dead Vikings, Hellstomper, The Hip Priests, Sonic Negroes, Duff McKagan's Loaded, The Bible Beaters, Fuckland, and several compilation albums featuring such bands as The Specimens, The Nicotine Fits, The Luxury Pushers, Incomprehensible Rubbish, Disguster, Los Gatos Locos, The Pneumonias, Lucifer Star Machine, and others."Zodiac Killer Records - Discography" https://www.allmusic.com/artist/zodiac-killer-records- mn0001037555 ==References== ==External links== * Official website * Zodiac Killer Radio," Category:Record labels established in 1991 Category:American independent record labels Category:Punk record labels
